templates.title: CRM
templates.description: CRM application with adminer. Using traefikv2 rProxy (should be preinstaled on your docker platform).
templates.name: crm

env.name: STACKNAME
env.label: Unique name (or ID) of this stack
env.description: It is used as name for database, traefik, etc. String with lowecase letters, digits and underscores. It must not contain spaces, dashes etc.

env.name: PHP_VERSION
env.label: PHP version
env.description: Version of the PHP used in the containers.

env.name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
env.label: MariaDB password.
env.description: Password for the $STACKNAME database user.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_LATEST_BUILD
env.label: Download latest build?
env.description: Download latest build and make update when init container starts. Should be yes for first start of the stack.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_URL
env.label: Download URL
env.description: URL where can be app build downloaded.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_USERNAME
env.label: Download username
env.description: Username for download build.

env.name: DOWNLOAD_PASSWORD
env.label: Download password
env.description: Password for download build.

env.name: APP_URL
env.label: Application URL
env.description: Domain name without http:// or https://

env.name: APP_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: ADMINER_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Adminer allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: APP_VOLUME_SHARED
env.label: App shared volume
env.description: Volume or bind mount for application's 'shared' folder. It is recommended to use bind mount to the host filesystem.

templates.title: Floweye2
templates.description: Floweye2 application. Using traefikv2 rProxy (should be preinstaled on your docker platform).
templates.name: floweye

env.name: STACKNAME
env.label: Unique name (or ID) of this stack
env.description: It is used as name for database, traefik, etc. String with lowecase letters, digits and underscores. It must not contain spaces, dashes etc.

env.name: FLOWEYE_FQDN
env.label: Floweye FQDN
env.description: FQDN of the floweye application.

env.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
env.label: Postgresql password.
env.description: Password for the database user.

env.name: SMTP_HOST
env.label: SMTP Host
env.description: Password for the $STACKNAME database user.

env.name: SMTP_PORT
env.label: SMTP Port
env.description: Typicaly 25 or 465 or 587.

env.name: SMTP_USERNAME
env.label: SMTP Username
env.description: Username for connecting to the SMTP server.

env.name: SMTP_PASSWORD
env.label: SMTP Password
env.description: Password for connecting to the SMTP server.

env.name: SMTP_SECURE
env.label: SMTP Encryption
env.description: Type of encryption used in SMTP communcation.

env.name: MAILING_FROM
env.label: Mailing e-mail
env.description: Source e-mail address used for emails sent from the Floweye.

env.name: MAILING_FROM_NAME
env.label: Mailing name
env.description: Name of the sender used for emails sent from the Floweye.

env.name: FLOWEYE_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access this application web gui.

env.name: ADMINER_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Adminer allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access Adminer web gui.

env.name: SMTP_IP_WHITELIST
env.label: Mailpit allowed IP addresses
env.description: A coma separated list of IP addresses which are allowed to access Mailpit web gui.

templates.title: Stanley
templates.description: The Stanley app connects to a specified mailbox using IMAP. It automatically creates processes in the Floweye application from the received emails.To ensure proper functionality, you need to create the configuration file config.local.neon inside the config folder.
templates.name: stanley

env.name: STACKNAME
env.label: Unique name (or ID) of this stack
env.description: It is used as name for database, traefik, etc. String with lowecase letters, digits and underscores. It must not contain spaces, dashes etc.

env.name: STANLEY_VERSION
env.label: Stanley version
env.description: The Stanley version should match the Floweye version.

env.name: STANLEY_VOLUME_CONFIG
env.label: Stanley volume with config files
env.description: Volume or bind mount for application's 'shared' folder. It is recommended to use bind mount to the host filesystem.
